author: anon.
contents:
Glossary of selected words from Iliad 1, 97-99.
Except for one entry (l. 1) identical entries in P.Oxy. 24, 2405 (CPP 0438), but in a different order.
Probably a school text.
statepreservation: single papyrus fragment (14 x 7.2 cm) of a light brown color, broken off on all sides, containing the remains of 6 lines of writing. The left margin that has been preserved measures 1.7 cm. Lemmata and explanation are written in single column. Horizontal kollÃªsis between ll. 3 and 4.
lectionalsigns:
-no lectional signs;
-phonetic mistake: ? for ??; itacistic misspelling: ? for ?;
-each new entry starts on a new line; blank spaces separate lemmata from explanation
hand: large, upright writing with varying letter size; lines sloping downward; large ? of which the last stroke reaches down well into the following line of writing, right diagonal of the ? is extended; well separating the letters.
